We had every console going. My father was just as interested in this new technology as we were. I'm artistic - was well able to entertain myself as a child - & had to be dragged in from climbing trees, when it was raining. I wouldn't say I turned out fantastic, but I'm alright. Was the same fear mongering not there when the T.V. first came along? Besides, kids have to be tech savvy these days, otherwise they will get left behind in the future & have less opportunities available to them. Learning to code is akin to learning a language.

America needs a serious, eloquent, and transparent leader, not a clown.
